name: EntertainmentUK-Edition
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Provides the daily updates from the BBC News - Entertainment & Arts website. It allows you to stay up to date with the latest news and features you want from BBC News - Entertainment & Arts. UK-Edition.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
